src:
联赛杯-利物浦补时进球5-5 点球战5-4淘汰阿森纳

01 Nov 2019, 02:51

【新浪体育31日讯】(英国当地时间30日19:30)，2019/20赛季英格兰联赛杯第4轮一场焦点战在安菲尔德球场展开争夺，利物浦主场总分10比9淘汰阿森纳，18岁巴西新援马蒂内利梅开二度，红军两度扳平，奥里吉第94分钟救主，双方5-5战平。点球大战，利物浦5-4险胜阿森纳晋级。利物浦近5个赛季9战阿森纳取得5胜4平保持不败，近7个主场对阵阿森纳取得5胜2平。这是双方联赛杯第15次交手，此前分别取得5胜4平5负。双方历史交锋227场，利物浦88胜61平78负占据上风。两队全部轮换11人，17岁荷兰新援范登博格首次代表利物浦出场。厄齐尔本赛季第3次代表阿森纳出战。利物浦(4-3-3)：62-凯莱赫；76-威廉姆斯，12-戈麦斯，72-范登博格，7-米尔纳；15-张伯伦(81’,68-奇里韦拉)，20-拉拉纳，8-凯塔(55’,48-琼斯)；67-埃利奥特，27-奥里吉，24-布鲁斯特。阿森纳(4-2-3-1)：26-马丁内斯；2-贝莱林，20-穆斯塔菲，16-霍尔丁，31-科拉希纳茨(83’,3-蒂尔尼)；11-托雷拉(72’,8-塞瓦略斯)，28-维尔洛克；15-奈尔斯，10-厄齐尔(65’,29-贡多齐)，77-萨卡；35-马蒂内利。
text:
League Cup - Liverpool's stoppage 5-5 penalty and 5-4 elimination Arsenal

01 Nov 2019, 02:51

[Sina Sports 31st News] (19:30 local time on the 30th in the UK), the second round of the 2019/20 season of the English League Cup, a focus battle at Anfield Stadium, Liverpool's total score of 10 to 9 eliminated Arsenal. The 18-year-old Brazilian new aid Martinelli scored twice, the Reds equalized twice, and Origui was the Savior in the 94th minute, with a 5-5 draw between the two sides. Penalty shootout, Liverpool 5-4 win over Arsenal. Liverpool's five games in the last five seasons, Arsenal won 5 wins and 4 draws unbeaten, nearly 7 home games against Arsenal to get 5 wins and 2 draws. This is the fifteenth match between the two sides of the League Cup, previously won 5 wins, 4 draws and 5 losses. The history of the two sides confronted 227 games, and Liverpool 88 wins, 61 draws and 78 losses prevailed. The two teams all rotated 11 people, 17-year-old Dutch new aid Van den Borg played for Liverpool for the first time. Ozil played for the third time this season on behalf of Arsenal. Liverpool (4-3-3): 62-Kelah; 76-Williams, 12-Gomez, 72-Vandenborg, 7-Milna; 15- Chamberlain (81', 68-Chiriwela ), 20-Lalana, 8-Keta (55', 48-Jones); 67-Elliot, 27-Origi, 24-Brush. Arsenal (4-2-3-1): 26-Martinez; 2-Bellin, 20-Mustafy, 16-Hordin, 31-Kolasinac (83', 3- Tilney); 11-Torrera (72', 8-Sevallos), 28-Willock; 15-Nells, 10-Ozil (65', 29-Gondozi), 77 - Saka; 35- Martinelli.
